title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning July 17, 2023, that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we ask whether board directors have considered the security of their email communications in light of the latest attack against Microsoft. Plus: what should directors take from the White House’s National Cybersecurity Strategy Implementation Plan; how might the latest security and privacy regulations affect your organization; and what must directors think about in light of a rise in litigation following breaches?
